questions.question_text:
A Tableau CRM consultant created a dashboard that went through review. A few charts were added and removed in the process. The dashboard is now approved for production.

Which best practice should be done before releasing the dashboard?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I think the answer is A

Selected Answer: A
Is A the correct answer

choices.B: Apply conditional formatting on the new charts.
choices.C: Rename all the queries to correspond with the defined naming convention.
choices.D: Modify the XMD so all labels and values are user-friendly.
choices.A: Remove the redundant queries to ensure dashboard performance.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers (UC) sells mostly to the North American market. A consultant is studying the spending habits of UC's customers where the consultant collects the data with a Region column that is 94% North America, 3% Rest of the World, 3% null.

What is the appropriate action to take?

choices.C: Replace the nulls with North America since they are likely "North America".
choices.D: Drop the column since there is no valuable information from the column.
choices.A: Leave the data as-is, let Discovery deal with nulls.
choices.B: Replace the nulls with "Rest of the World" since Discovery rejects nulls.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Leave as it, Einstein Discovery can handle nulls gracefully, and automatically exclude or impute them based on the context

questions.question_text:
A consultant built a Tableau CRM app for the Sales Operations team. The Sales Operations team wants to share their app with other people at the company. The consultant recommends distributing the app as a Tableau CRM template app.

What can the consultant do to give the Sales team more choices and options with future apps that are generated from the Sales Operations app?

choices.C: Create multiple layouts, and reorder all the widgets so that they fit nicely within the new default width.
choices.B: Create a single layout and reorder all the widgets so that they fit nicely when viewing on either device.
choices.D: Create a single layout and allow Tableau CRM to automatically organize dashboard contents to be optimal for the device type.
choices.A: Create multiple layouts, ensure the layout selectors match the device, and resize/hide widgets as necessary to ensure the content is appropriate for the device screen size.
